__e: And you, just give Turk the job already.
Turk hasn't changed a bit since college.
I didn't know what to say to Turk next, and then it happened.
So, Turk doesn't know which way to turn, he's so drunk, so finally he stops.
I cannot believe that Turk didn't pick you.

I gotta run home and put out canned cat food because the dry stuff doesn't cut it anymore, plus Turk and I can't be together cos I'm working doubles and he's moonlighting so we can send my mother to a decent retirement community.
